price: Então, hoje, os que crêem se riem dos renegadores da Fé,
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
